name: Indian Institute of Technology Madras
program: BS Degree in Data Science and Application
description: Pursuing a BS in Data Science and Applications from IIT Madras, this program offers an in-depth curriculum in data analysis, machine learning, and full-stack development. It emphasizes hands-on projects, enabling practical experience in tackling real-world data challenges. The program builds a strong foundation in both theoretical and applied data science skills.

name: Atma Ram Sanatan Dharma College
description: Pursuing a BSc in Computer Science (Hons.) from Atma Ram Sanatan Dharma College, University of Delhi, this program offers a comprehensive curriculum in computer science, covering programming, algorithms, data structures, and software engineering. It combines theory with practical application, providing hands-on experience in coding and problem-solving.

name: Vikas Bharat Public School
description: Studied at Vikas Bharati Public School, where the curriculum emphasized a strong foundation in both academics and extracurriculars, fostering a balanced approach to personal and intellectual growth. The school provided a comprehensive environment for developing key skills in various subjects, preparing students for higher education and beyond.
